rows.label: qev056105_MSG0001
rows.name:
Did On'tonam send you? Ah. Come then.
Have a look at this beautiful creature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056105_MSG0002
rows.name:
Beneath a fierce exterior poised to devour all it sees,
it hides a spark of intelligence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056105_MSG0003
rows.name:
Beneath its overwhelming presence, there is a faint
sense of nostalgia. Something...primal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056105_MSG0004
rows.name:
It seems akin to the beings you humans worshiped.
Gods and devils, as you called them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056105_JNK0010
rows.name: Urge

rows.label: qev056105_SEL0011
rows.name: Convince Run'tonam to run away.

rows.label: qev056105_JNK0020
rows.name: Observe

rows.label: qev056105_SEL0021
rows.name: Join Run'tonam in awestruck observation.

rows.label: qev056105_MSG0005
rows.name:
The Ovah within me has also demanded I flee from the
moment I entered these woods.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056105_MSG0006
rows.name:
But were I to listen, I would never discover what it is
the Ovah fears so greatly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056105_MSG0007
rows.name: It is a wondrous beast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056105_MSG0008
rows.name: I am glad I ignored my Ovah's exhortations to run.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056105_MSG0009
rows.name:
I am certain this forest contains something of crucial
importance to my people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056105_MSG0010
rows.name: Something so great it moves the Ovah to terror.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056105_MSG0011
rows.name:
We have a responsibility to seek the truth.
Both of the hidden nature of the world,
and the reason for our birth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056105_MSG0012
rows.name:
Even if that means disobeying the Ovah.
...Even if it means dying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056105_MSG0013
rows.name: We must keep moving forward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056105_MSG0014
rows.name: Please relay this message to On'tonam for me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056105_MSG0015
rows.name:
Until we learn to master the Ovah, rather than allowing
it to command us, our future will lead nowhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056105_MSG0016
rows.name:
We are fortunate to have been given this wonderful
power. Please help our people to use it meaningfully.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056105_MSG0018
rows.name: Oh, and...thank him. For giving birth to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056105_MSG0019
rows.name: Ah, yes. So that was what the Ovah saw![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056105_MSG0020
rows.name:
A time long ago, far before my kind was born...
A beautiful truth crowned by this awesome creature...[ST:wait ]
